title: 1.48.0: Throw "SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference" when building in RustyHermit.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Building [libhermit-rs](https://github.com/hermitcore/libhermit-rs) with the latest nightly compiler failed with a SIGSEV and the error message _"invalid memory reference"_. My local version based on PR #75843 works fine on my system. 

You see the problem also at [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.com/github/hermitcore/uhyve/jobs/376714176), where I test our unikernel on top of our hypervisor. Do you have any idea, why the compiler crashes?

### Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```

LLVM version: 11.0
```
